help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about boat rentals
help.faq0Title: How do I book a boat?
help.faq0Text: Browse our explore page to find the perfect boat for your trip. Select your dates, add any extras, and complete the reservation. You will receive a confirmation email with all the details.
help.faq1Text: Cancellations made 48 hours or more before your trip receive a full refund. Cancellations within 48 hours may be subject to a fee. Please check the specific listing for details.
help.faq2Title: Do I need a license to rent a boat?
help.faq2Text: It depends on the boat and location. Some boats require a valid boating license, while others can be operated without one when a captain is included. Check the listing details before booking.
help.faq3Title: What is included in the rental price?
help.faq3Text: The base price typically includes the boat rental for the specified duration. Fuel, captain fees (if required), and equipment may vary by listing. Always review the listing details before booking.
help.faq4Title: How can I contact customer support?
help.faq4Text: Our support team is available 7 days a week via email and chat. We aim to respond within 24 hours. For urgent matters during your trip, use the contact information provided in your booking confirmation.
help.faq5Text: Yes, you can modify your reservation through your account dashboard up to 48 hours before your trip. Changes are subject to availability and may affect the total price.

pricing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about the product and billing
pricing.pricingFaq0Title: Is there a free trail available?
pricing.pricingFaq0Text: Our Customer Experience Team is available 7 days a week and we offer 2 ways to get in contact. Email and Chat. We try to reply quickly, so you need not to wait too long for a response!
